card_name: Life as a Means to a Triumph
rules_text:
Create an X/X Elemental creature token that's all colors.
Reconstruct {X}{G}{G}{G} [i](You may cast this from your graveyard for its reconstruct cost reduced by the mana value of a permanent you sacrifice as you cast it this way. Then exile this.)[/i]
notes:
Achilles Come Down — Gang of Youths
